name: naturalistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows things as they really are: These artists are interested in depicting the world as naturalistically as possible. She's an author who writes naturalistically about our world.
in a way that is similar to what exists in nature: They acquired the language naturalistically, not in a classroom. These patients were treated naturalistically.
More examplesFewer examplesThe scenes in the police station were presented naturalistically.He respects the rules of perspective and uses his painting materials naturalistically.She creates dreamlike images featuring naturalistically painted animals.The play is naturalistically acted, and emotionally powerful.This kind of behaviour can be naturalistically explained.Some people learn naturalistically, but others prefer more formal courses.
